name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-typespec-repairs-oauth
title: Tech Support agent using TypeSpec for Microsoft 365 Copilot
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to build a declarative agent for Microsoft 365 Copilot using TypeSpec for Microsoft 365 Copilot that allows you ground responses in WebSearch, SharePoint and Copilot connectors
